item.description:
Tantra To Love, and Prana and Rene present.....Kama Sutra - Tantric Partner Yoga! 

 

Many of you were at their workshop the last time they visited us in Boston.  They were VERY well received -- let's welcome them back whole-heartedly!!!

 

I'm posting this early because I have a feeling it will FILL and I want all of you that want to be there, to reserve your space!  Early!  

 

Connect deeply with yourSelf in a slow tantric practice, then come together with a partner for Tantric Partner Yoga poses and breathing. Access Kundalini energy for Self healing, deepening intimacy and expanding your connection with each other and The Divine.  

 

All are welcome!  We will be in pairs throughout the workshop and engaging intimately. This workshop is typically taught for couples, but for our Meetup group, we are teaching it to support singles (or those who come w/out their partner.)  There will be opportunity to switch partners during the workshop so you will have a variety of experience, if you like.  

 

Modifications for poses with be offered for all body types, abilities and for your own personal comfort!   Bring your own yoga mat, if desired (there are many in the space we are using.) Props are available for use as well.  

 

Feel free to email with questions.
item.name: Kama Sutra~Tantric Partner Yoga
